title: Gamma helps teams create polished presentations with Claude \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Gamma helps teams create polished presentations with Claude \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Gamma, an AI-powered presentation platform, went viral after launching in March 2023—but the team was concerned about quality and costs as they scaled. Claude helped Gamma lower costs while increasing user satisfaction by 30% and free-to-paid conversions by 20%.
